alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Victoria, Goliad and north central Bee Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Inez to Oak Village to near Charco. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Goliad, Guadalupe, Fannin, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weesatche, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Charco, Downtown Victoria, Schroeder and Dacosta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 626 and 650. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 678. US Highway 77 between mile markers 566 and 594. US Highway 87 between mile markers 800 and 826. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
